plot: Against the backdrop of Die Another Day (2002), Damon Hill chooses between the Aston Martin Vanquish and the Ferrari 575M Maranello. Richard Burns talks with Jeremy, and Steve Coogan is the next star.

To celebrate the launch of the James Bond film Die Another Day (2002), the team compare two classic Bond cars, an Aston Martin Vanquish and a Ferrari 575M, with some help from Formula 1 world champion Damon Hill, while The Stig takes both cars for a lap around the test track. Steve Coogan is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Allister Coots

Against the backdrop of James Bond's newest movie, Die Another Day (2002), Jeremy and British Formula One World Champion, Damon Hill, are asked to make a decision between the Aston Martin Vanquish and the Ferrari 575M Maranello. As Jeremy interviews the British 2001 WRC Champion, Richard Burns, Jason tests the Nissan Skyline R34 GT-R. Finally--actor, producer, and writer, Steve Coogan--is the next star in Top Gear's reasonably-priced car.—Nick Riganas
